question_summary: User wants to reset their password
reference_response_en:
Hi there,

You can reset your password by clicking "Forgot Password" on the login page. You'll receive a reset link within a few minutes.

If you don't see the email, please check your spam folder. If you're still having trouble, let us know and we'll help you get back in.

Best,
The Support Team
reference_response_de:
Hallo,

Sie können Ihr Passwort zurücksetzen, indem Sie auf der Login-Seite auf "Passwort vergessen" klicken. Sie erhalten innerhalb weniger Minuten einen Link zum Zurücksetzen.

Falls Sie die E-Mail nicht finden, schauen Sie bitte in Ihrem Spam-Ordner nach. Sollte es weiterhin Probleme geben, melden Sie sich gerne bei uns.

Mit freundlichen Grüßen,
Das Support-Team

question_summary: User wants to cancel their subscription
reference_response_en:
Hi,

You can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings under Billing → Manage Plan. Your access will remain active until the end of your current billing period.

If you'd like to share feedback on why you're leaving, we'd love to hear it — it helps us improve.

Best,
The Support Team
reference_response_fr:
Bonjour,

Vous pouvez annuler votre abonnement à tout moment depuis les paramètres de votre compte sous Facturation → Gérer le plan. Votre accès restera actif jusqu'à la fin de votre période de facturation en cours.

Si vous souhaitez nous faire part de vos commentaires, n'hésitez pas — cela nous aide à nous améliorer.

Cordialement,
L'équipe Support

question_summary: User is hitting API rate limits
reference_response_en:
Hi,

Our API enforces rate limits to ensure fair usage across all customers. The current limits are:

- Free plan: 100 requests/minute
- Pro plan: 1,000 requests/minute
- Enterprise: Custom limits

If you're hitting 429 errors, we recommend implementing exponential backoff in your client. You can also check your current usage in the dashboard under API → Usage.

If you need higher limits, let us know your use case and we can discuss options.

Best,
The Support Team
